item.title: American Girl Goes Goth as Wednesday Addams in New Limited-Edition Doll Collab
item.description: Ahead of the second season premiere of ‘Wednesday,’ the Mattel-owned toy company has debuted an exclusive 18-inch collector’s design inspired by star Jenna Ortega.

item.title: 30 Bingeworthy Young Adult Films and TV Shows Released in Recent Years
item.description: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty,’ ‘Never Have I Ever,’ ‘We Were Liars,’ ‘Elite’ and ‘My Fault: London’ are among popular projects that recently hit screens.
